name: Konafa Plate
description: Dessert made with thin noodle-like pastry, soaked in sweet, sugar-based syrup. Layered with magic and passion. Our kunafa includes special ingredients and cheese hand-crafted by our chef.

name: Halawit Al Jibin
description: This dessert is made of a Semolina and cheese dough, filled with cream.

name: Mohalabiya
description: Milk pudding with rose water served with pistachio and rose leaves on the top.

name: Ruz b Haleeb
description: Rice pudding with added goodness of crunchy pistachios and flavoured with orange blossom water.
